title: Gates of the Dead City (3R81)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Wraith
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	To play, spot a Nazgul. Plays to your support area. Each time a [Wraith] card adds a burden, the Free Peoples player must exert a companion.
Lore:	”'…and they took Minas Ithil and abode in it, and they made it into a place of dread….'”
Rarity:	R
